title: Arabic 30
text: Deny not My servant should he ask anything from thee, for his face is My face; be then abashed before Me.

prev.title: Arabic 29
prev.text: Ascribe not to any soul that which thou wouldst not have ascribed to thee, and say not that which thou doest not. This is My command unto thee, do thou observe it.

next.title: Arabic 31
next.text: Bring thyself to account each day ere thou art summoned to a reckoning; for death, unheralded, shall come upon thee and thou shalt be called to give account for thy deeds.
